name: countpages
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seo_count_website_pages_in_google_index.
Tool description: API allows quickly and easily determine the number of pages from a particular website that are indexed in Google's
API description: Counts the number of website pages indexed by Google for a given URL using the specified RapidAPI service.

url.description: The URL of the website to check the number of indexed pages.
